title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/4/21
itunes:title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/4/21
description:
George Noory and Dr. Bruce Greyson explore his nearly five decades of research into near death experiences, how people struggle to explain the beautiful sights they see while their physical body is dead, and how religion may help form people's views of life after death.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
